title: No need to MarkBufferDirty(); GenericXLogFinish() does that.

body: @jeff-davis Thanks for submitting! I believe this should reduce some overhead?

Thanks @jeff-davis! Looks like the docs mention this as well.

> `GenericXLogFinish()` takes care of marking buffers dirty and setting their LSNs. You do not need to do this explicitly.

https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/generic-wal.html
